The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 06 April is 41,547 (4,808.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 01 April, there were 177 new confirmed cases (20.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 March, there were 228 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 22% (51 fewer cases).
